column4: I need help installing ATI FGLRX drivers on HP ProBook 4530s laptop that has sandy bridge intel gpu + amd HD6490 discreat graphics... If I install FGLRX, then X will not start (segmentation failt) :( ... Here is the log file http://pastebin.com/hsnCw47g
I have the same problem too, if I use old kernel
what version is the new and old kernel? I tried it on 3.0 and 3.1
